Functional Home Decor - Use mirror tiles to create a mirrored backsplash in your kitchen for a unique and functional design touch.
Lighting - Add LED lights to a mirror to create a DIY vanity lighting system in your bathroom.
Garden Element - Attach a mirror to the outside of your house to create a unique garden feature, adding a touch of whimsy to your outdoor space.
Window Replacement - Use a large mirror instead of regular windows in your kitchen or living room to create the illusion of more room and brighten up space.
Yoga Studio - Add mirrors to your yoga studio to create the illusion of a larger space and offer unique perspectives for stretching and practicing poses.
